statements: DELETE FROM anonymized_user_data WHERE age > 30 AND behavior_score < 0.5;
DELETE FROM user_events WHERE user_id = 3 AND event_type = 'login';
DELETE FROM user_events WHERE event_type = 'login' AND user_id = 2;
DELETE FROM user_locations WHERE location_id = 100 AND user_id = 5;
DELETE FROM users WHERE name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 2 AND action = 'login';
DELETE FROM activities WHERE user_id = 10 AND activity_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM activities WHERE user_id = 2 AND activity_type = 'login';
